reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 109/02: SAFETY STANDARDS, ANNUAL INSPECTION AND STRUCTURAL INSPECTION CERTIFICATES
reg_info.reg_name_text: SAFETY STANDARDS, ANNUAL INSPECTION AND STRUCTURAL INSPECTION CERTIFICATES
reg_info.act_under: Highway Traffic Act   Code de la route

content.content: 1. A licensee of a motor vehicle inspection station shall be deemed to be in compliance with the condition of the licence respecting safety standards certificates set out in clause 5 (c) of Regulation 601 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 if the licensee issues a copy of the safety standards certificate in Form 5 of that regulation that is in all material respects a likeness of that form. O. Reg 109/02, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. A licensee of a motor vehicle inspection station shall be deemed to be in compliance with the condition of the licence respecting safety standards certificates set out in clause 5 (c) of Regulation 601 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 if the licensee issues a copy of the safety standards certificate in Form 5 of that regulation that is in all material respects a likeness of that form. O. Reg 109/02, s. 1.

content.section: Copy of annual inspection certificates and structural inspection certificates
content.content: 2. A licensee of a motor vehicle inspection station shall be deemed to be in compliance with the condition of the licence respecting annual inspection certificates and structural inspection certificates set out in clause 5 (c) of Regulation 601 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 if the licensee issues a copy of the certificate in the form supplied by the Ministry that is in all material respects a likeness of that form. O. Reg 109/02, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. A licensee of a motor vehicle inspection station shall be deemed to be in compliance with the condition of the licence respecting annual inspection certificates and structural inspection certificates set out in clause 5 (c) of Regulation 601 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 if the licensee issues a copy of the certificate in the form supplied by the Ministry that is in all material respects a likeness of that form. O. Reg 109/02, s. 2.
